tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (ADVP (RB very) (ADVP (RB rarely))) (VP (VBP am) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (JJ desperate) (NN need)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN someone))))) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB talk) (PP (TO to)))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [need/NN nsubj>I/PRP advmod>[very/RB advmod>rarely/RB] cop>am/VBP case>in/IN amod>desperate/JJ nmod:of>[someone/NN case>of/IN] xcomp>[talk/VB mark>to/TO nmod>to/TO] punct>./.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Tonight)) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (CD one)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT those) (NNS nights))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [one/CD nsubj>Tonight/NNP cop>is/VBZ nmod:of>[nights/NNS case>of/IN det>those/DT] punct>./.]
